channel.title: Occupation and Redirection Distinctiveness
channel.description:
People complain about Butler being too boring or Court Wizard being too weak and etc.
Well, I think it's about time we make things more distinct and have it so occupation immunity and redirection immunity are two different things.
Classes that occupy: - Butler - Servant - Invoker
Classes that redirect: - Court Wizard - Drunk - Sage - Alcoholic - Invoker - Ritualist
Redirection is usually better than Occupation for Scum, as they still get use out of their ability. however, Occupation is just swingy.
So I propose these changes for starters:
Court Wizard, Sage, and Ritualist, when using Tornado, will become redirect immune, provided that Tornado bypasses redirect immunity.
